sentence.Network_en: Retrospectively, it seems as if they probably were negligent.
sentence.Network_cn: 回想起来，他们似乎很可能疏忽了。

sentence.Network_en: To ascribe opinions retrospectively is of course very dangerous.
sentence.Network_cn: 事后再翻出当初谁说了什么当然是很危险的。

sentence.Network_en: The House of Lords affirmed that the terms of a contract cannot be rewritten retrospectively.
sentence.Network_cn: 上议院申明合同条款改写后不具备追溯效力。

PerfectNetExp.abs: Objective To retrospectively evaluate prognostic factors withamong patients with surgically resected single brain metastases ., 目的回顾性分析手术切除单发脑转移瘤病人的预后及其影响因素.
retrospective 回顾的retrospectively 回顾地retrousse 向上翻的
12 patients misdiagnosed as tuberculosis peritonitis were retrospectively analysed.方法回顾分析 12例被误诊的结核性腹膜炎病例。
methods 16 cases of dysuria after suprapubic prostatectomy were analysed retrospectively .方法对16例耻骨上前列腺切除术后排尿困难的临床资料进行分析。

list.abs: 看美剧学英语:《生活大爆炸》回想当年... ... 4. OK,let me get this straight. 好，让我理下思路。 in retrospect 回想过去，回想起来.
retrospect 回想retrospective planning 挽救性规划rettiper 收废旧钻头者
问卷统计分析与SPSS应用 - MBA智库文档 ... Pseudo model, 近似模型 Retrospective study, 回顾性调查 Skewness, 偏度 ? ?ㄳ.
这篇研究设计为回溯性研究 (retrospective study)，分析的资料库是McNeil骨关节炎资料库 (也就是传说中的未发表数据，不过现在发 …
法律英语 ... 溯及既往原则 doctrine of retroactivity 溯及力 retrospect； retrospective effect 梭伦 Solon.

entry.def: A retrospective is an exhibition or showing of work done by an artist over many years, rather than his or her most recent work.

example.ex: ...a retrospective of the films of Judy Garland...
They honoured him with a retrospective exhibition in 1987.
example.tran: 他们在1987年为他举办了一次回顾展，以示敬意。

entry.def: Retrospective feelings or opinions concern things that happened in the past.

example.ex: Afterwards, retrospective fear of the responsibility would make her feel almost faint.
example.tran: 后来，回想起要负的责任她几乎会吓晕过去。

entry.tran: (法律、法律行为等)有追溯效力的
entry.def: Retrospective laws or legal actions take effect from a date before the date when they are officially approved.

example.ex: Bankers are quick to condemn retrospective tax legislation.
example.tran: 银行家们立即声讨有追溯效力的税收立法。

means.word_mean: 1. in a manner contemplative of past events;

sentences.sentence: "retrospectively, he seems like a great artist"
